_header: Jesu my love my joy my rest
Subjects: Christ, wounds of; prayers, by Christ and His Passion
_description: On the Wounds of Christ — six lines (aaaabb)

BLAdd37049.Transcription:
Ihesu my luf my ioy my resteþi perfite luf close in my
                    bresteþat I þe luf and never resteAnd mak me luf þe of
                    al þinge bestAnd wounde my hert in þi luf freþat I may
                    reyne in ioy ever-more with þe
